description: Ayaka`s Absol appears to be Ayaka`s main Pok√©mon. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Absol. Ayaka`s Absol battled against Alan`s Charizard in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle in a forest in Kalos but after a fierce battle Ayaka`s Absol ended up loosing the fight and Alan`s Charizard won.
name: Absol (Ayaka)
